data.title: providing NHS news & intelligence
data.meta_description: Stay up to date with NHS news & Intelligence. Bespoke subscription options available on individual and multi access subscriptions. From £49.75 per quarter.
data.text:
Health Service Journal (HSJ) is the news and insight service for all healthcare leaders working in, for, or with the NHS. We bring you healthcare and NHS news, and are the only organisation that covers all aspects of publicly funded healthcare from health policy to acute and primary care, specialist services to mental health and commissioning to provision.

We provide news, analysis, best practice information and advice from the most influential people in health, for the most influential people in health.

HSJ Expert Briefings

Our Expert Briefing newsletters are a premium feature of our Insight subscription package and offer additional analysis, predictions and commentary on a range of specific topics each week.

The

Integrator

Insider tales and must-read analysis on how integration is reshaping health and care systems, NHS providers, primary care, and commissioning.

The

Download

The fortnightly newsletter that unpacks system leaders’ priorities for digital technology and the impact they are having on delivering health services.

London

Eye

Essential insight into England’s biggest health economy.

Recovery

Watch

Recovering services from the covid crisis is the big task for NHS leaders for the foreseeable future. The Recovery Watch newsletter tracks prospects and progress.

"The HSJ plays a really important role for NHS leaders, providing a stream of news in a timely way – ranging from local stories through to commentary on the big national stories as they unfold"

Claire Murdock, CEO, Central and North West London NHS Foundation Trust

To see the rest of our expert briefings click here

“We use HSJi to obtain accurate, up to date information about Trusts and CCGs (and increasingly the wider range of organisations and partnerships) to inform our discussions with them. Having this information at our fingertips means we can use it to help us to tailor our services for local health economies and for patients.”

Nadine Miles, Director of Market Development, Spirit Health Group

HSJ Solutions – NHS best practice database

HSJ Solutions is a completely unique database of best practice case studies from across the NHS carefully selected from all shortlisted and winning entries to our HSJ Awards, HSJ Value Awards and Patient Safety Awards. Evidence-based and objectively judged: 1,500+ case studies from 209 trusts so far, continually updated throughout the year. Editorially curated on a searchable database of real-life NHS excellence.

“There are big risks to us if we don’t share best practice. We want a breath of fresh air; we want to change. There is absolutely a financial cost if we don’t search for best practice – we need this to take our projects to the board.”

Medical Director, Northumbria Healthcare
